summary: From opposing ethnicities, Ngabo and Sangwa are tested when old-timers warn, "Hutus and Tutsis should not be friends." An intense and inspiring portrait of youth in Rwanda, 'Munyurangabo' ... See full summary »
cast: Jeff Rutagengwa|Eric Ndorunkundiye|Jean Marie Vianney Nkurikiyinka|Jean Pierre Harerimana|Narcicia Nyirabucyeye|Edouard B. Uwayo|Jean-Pierre Aimé Harerimana|Pierre Claver Kayitsinga|Etienne Rugazora
title: Munyurangabo
